descriptionHtml:
Nightingale Armor Revamp

THIS IS FOR MALE CHARACTERS ONLY.

There is a Dark Hood and a Light Hood File, Download to your preference.

Installation:
Open up your Skyrim folder. Usually:
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

Drag/Drop the Data file and let it overwrite, or allow, or whatever it usually asks.

Run the game after the files are transferred over.

Created By:
Lycosa (Steam: _lycosa)
